chessgame

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • chessgame.Position

  • public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents a position on the chess board. A position has a file and rank: file = column rank = row

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Position(int file, int rank)
      Creates a representation of the position of a chess unit on a chess board.
      Position(Position other)
      Copy another position.

      Checks if 2 Position objects are equal, returns true if its file and rank are equal.

      Gets the file(column) of a unit.
      int getRank()
      Gets the rank(row) of a unit.
      java.lang.String toString()
      A string representation of a position.

      Turn down on the board.

      Turn left on the board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Position

        public Position(int file,
                int rank)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a representation of the position of a chess unit on a chess board.
        Parameters:
        file - The column of the position
        rank - The row of the position
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If file or rank is outside of the board

      • Position

        public Position(Position other)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Copy another position.
        Parameters:
        other - The position that is to be copied.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If other is not valid.

      • getFile

        public int getFile()
        Gets the file(column) of a unit.
        Returns:
        The file of the unit.

      • getRank

        public int getRank()
        Gets the rank(row) of a unit.
        Returns:
        The rank of the unit.

      • turnLeft

        public static Position turnLeft(Position pos)
        Turn left on the board.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position from which you want to turn to.
        Returns:
        A position left to pos or pos if cannot turn left.

      • turnRight

        public static Position turnRight(Position pos)
        Turn right on the board.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position from which you want to turn to.
        Returns:
        A position right to pos or pos if cannot turn left.

      • turnUp

        public static Position turnUp(Position pos)
        Turn up on the board.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position from which you want to turn to.
        Returns:
        A position up to pos or pos if cannot turn left.

      • turnDown

        public static Position turnDown(Position pos)
        Turn down on the board.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position from which you want to turn to.
        Returns:
        A position down to pos or pos if cannot turn left.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        A string representation of a position.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string in the format of "(file, rank)".

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Position other)
        Checks if 2 Position objects are equal, returns true if its file and rank are equal.
        Parameters:
        other - The position to compare to.
        Returns:
        true if file and rank are equal, false otherwise.
